LanguageData.OE_Cosmol.label: cosmol
LanguageData.OE_Cosmol.description: A special immunostimulant used to enhance immunity and treat various diseases. Obsidia technology, the drug is non-addictive and has no after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Slugol.label: slugol
LanguageData.OE_Slugol.description: A unique medical specialty, a potent drug based on Luciferium, is used to treat serious wounds and diseases. Obsidia technology, the drug is non-addictive and has no after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Sevide.label: sevide
LanguageData.OE_Sevide.description: Deadly poison, used by assassins or as a means of execution. Obsidia technology gradually weakens the body, with a minor lethal outcome.
